org.crosswire.jsword.index.lucene
类 LuceneIndex

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.jsword.index.AbstractIndex
      org.crosswire.jsword.index.lucene.LuceneIndex
所有已实现的接口：
Activatable, Index
public class LuceneIndex
extends AbstractIndex
implements Activatable

Implement the SearchEngine using Lucene as the search engine.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.

方法详细信息

find

public Key find(java.lang.String search)
         throws BookException
从接口 Index 复制的描述
Find the set of references that satisfy the query. Query is anything that the underlying index can handle. If the query being searched for is null then an empty Key MUST be returned. Users of this index may use this functionality to get empty KeyLists which they then use to aggregate other searches done on this index.

指定者：
接口 Index 中的 find
参数：
search - The text to search for
返回：
The references to the word
抛出：
BookException

getKey

public Key getKey(java.lang.String name)
           throws NoSuchKeyException
从接口 Index 复制的描述
An index must be able to create KeyLists for users in a similar way to the Book that it is indexing.

指定者：
接口 Index 中的 getKey
参数：
name - The string to convert to a Key
返回：
A new Key representing the given string, if possible
抛出：
NoSuchKeyException - If the string can not be turned into a Key
另请参见：
KeyFactory.getKey(String)

activate

public final void activate(Lock lock)
从接口 Activatable 复制的描述
Called to indicate that the Book should initialize itself, and consume whatever system resources it needs to be able to respond to other queries.

指定者：
接口 Activatable 中的 activate
参数：
lock - An attempt to ensure that only the Activator calls this method

deactivate

public final void deactivate(Lock lock)
从接口 Activatable 复制的描述
Called to indicate that the Book should release whatever system resources it can to make way for other uses.

指定者：
接口 Activatable 中的 deactivate
参数：
lock - An attempt to ensure that only the Activator calls this method
